titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Georg Henrik von Wright, 12. 2. 1950
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der Trinity College Library; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (von Wright, S. 61; WiC, S. 459).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: My eldest sister died very peacefully yesterday evening. We had expected her end hourly for the last 3 days. It wasn't a shock.

I'm in very good health. I see Miss Anscombe 2-3 times a week, & we even had a discussion the other day which wasn't too bad. â€’ I was very glad indeed to hear that Geache's lectures are good. Frege was just the right food for him!
Please give my love to all my friends.
